room.name: Estate Gates
room.description: Type "TALK GROUNDSKEEPER" to speak with him.
room.NPCdialogue: Welcome. My Hut is to the west. Type "GO WEST" to follow me there.

room.name: Keeper's Hut
room.description: Those blackberry vines to the northwest are thick.. USE GLOVES to get through them.
room.NPCdialogue: Type "TAKE [ITEM NAME]", then "USE [ITEM NAME]" if you find anything good.

room.name: Gardens
room.description: Plants are painful around here. If you have food, type "EAT [ITEM NAME]" to heal yourself.
room.NPCdialogue: I use weed killer on invasive plants... You should EAT that BLACKBERRY for now.

room.name: Hill
room.description: Looks like an orb fell from above. "TAKE" the ORB and return it to the Treehouse.
room.NPCdialogue: I don't think this is an Orb Tree. That item must be important! "GO UP"

room.name: Treehouse
room.description: This place is some kind of a shrine. "USE ORB" to place it on the altar.
room.NPCdialogue: Either this is a dream or your Uncle is in REAL TROUBLE...

room.name: Outside
room.description: The Outside of the mansion is very creepy. There is a hazy mist in the air. Over in the Corner you notice the GroundsKeeper.
room.NPCdialogue: You'll need a key to enter, I've been locked out.

room.name: Foyer
room.description: The size of the grand Foyer leaves you in awe. There are vines wrapped around the ceiling trickling down the stairs blocking your way up.
room.NPCdialogue: Check the Library

room.name: Kitchen
room.description: The Kitchen smells of rotten elderberries. You notice the food elevator door has been broken open.
room.NPCdialogue: Lets move back into the Living Room.

room.name: Bathroom
room.description: The Bathroom is surprisingly clean compared to the rest of the mansion besides some research papers scattered about.
room.NPCdialogue: Lets move back into the Living Room.

room.name: Dining Room
room.description: The Dining Room has a giant mahogany table with a spread of what seems to be rotten fruit.
room.NPCdialogue: Pick up that rambutan

room.name: Library
room.description: The Library has bookshelves almost double my height. Something sticks out to me about an interesting looking book on the east side of the room.
room.NPCdialogue: That steel key can be useful.

room.name: Living Room
room.description: The Living Room seems to be the central connecting point of the house. There seems to be some weird, green fluid on the ground near the eastern door.
room.NPCdialogue: This place is huge, grab that map.

room.name: Upper Hall
room.description: The Upper Hall is a wreck. There are holes in the ceiling, the sun is shining through and hits your face almost peacefully though.
room.NPCdialogue: Go inside Foyer

room.name: Guest Room
room.description: It almost seems like the Guest Room has it's own ecosystem developing inside of it.
room.NPCdialogue: Lets move back into the Living Room.

room.name: Green House Floor 1
room.description: Wow! The mansion has an entire Green House filled with many exotic looking plants. Some of the trees are taller than the second floor balcony!
room.NPCdialogue: Find the Steel Key!

room.name: Hidden Office
room.description: There is a Desk in the middle of the room with a potted fern next to it. There seems to be some type of beaker with a neon green liquid on the desk.
room.NPCdialogue: OHH!! It's elixir!!!

room.name: Master Bedroom
room.description: This must have been your Uncle's bedroom. There are more research papers scattered about.
room.NPCdialogue: This Journal seems important!

room.name: Master Bathroom
room.description: The Master Bathroom has more papers spread about and other various objects thrown about.
room.NPCdialogue: Look for an Iron Key!

room.name: Green House Floor 2
room.description: You can see the whole Green House from a second floor balcony. There is a huge Plant Monster that looks extremely hungry.
room.NPCdialogue: Lets check the Laboratory

room.name: Laboratory
room.description: The Laboratory has a lot of broken glass and random jars of chemicals and liquids of all colors.
room.NPCdialogue: The weed killer is very important.
